title: Bug 10022: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
OB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user goes to Preferences > Workbench and selects "Perform build automatically on resource modification". The Build menu option still appears in the Java popup menus.
EB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should be disabled when the user selects "Perform build automatically on resource modification" in the Preferences > Workbench settings.
SR: To reproduce, enable the "Perform build automatically on resource modification" option in the Preferences > Workbench settings. Then, open the Java perspective and right-click on any item to see the context-sensitive popup menu. The "Build" action should be disabled.
